Cryptolens is a Software Licensing as a: Cryptolens is a Software Licensing as a Service (SLaaS) platform that provides developers with tools to manage software licenses, protect against piracy, and analyze usage data.
Your Cryptolens access token. Get it fro: Your Cryptolens access token. Get it from https://app.cryptolens.io/User/AccessToken

Block a license key to prevent it from b: Block a license key to prevent it from being accessible by most Web API methods

Name: Name
The name of the customer (max 100 charac: The name of the customer (max 100 characters)
The email of the customer (max 100 chara: The email of the customer (max 100 characters)
The company name the customer belongs to: The company name the customer belongs to (max 100 characters)
If enabled, a portal link will be return: If enabled, a portal link will be returned where the customer can view their licenses
If enabled, the customer can activate an: If enabled, the customer can activate and deactivate devices through the customer portal
If enabled, multiple user accounts can b: If enabled, multiple user accounts can be associated with this customer
The serial key string to block: The serial key string to block
The number of days from today the licens: The number of days from today the license key should be valid. Default is 0 (no expiration).
Additional notes about the license key (: Additional notes about the license key (max 500 characters)
Block the key from being accessed by the: Block the key from being accessed by the Activation method
The ID of the customer to associate with: The ID of the customer to associate with this license key
The maximum number of computers that can: The maximum number of computers that can activate the key. Default is 0 (unlimited).
A list of machine codes (separated by ne: A list of machine codes (separated by new lines) that will be prioritized during activation
The ID of the reseller to associate with: The ID of the reseller to associate with this license key
The number of keys to generate. Default: The number of keys to generate. Default is 1. Maximum 1000 per request.
Authorization headers are injected autom: Authorization headers are injected automatically from your connection.

Trigger when a new API event is logged (: Trigger when a new API event is logged (activation, deactivation, key creation, etc.)
Filter events for a specific product (op: Filter events for a specific product (optional)
Filter events for a specific license key: Filter events for a specific license key (requires Product ID)
Filter by event states (comma-separated: Filter by event states (comma-separated numbers). E.g., 1010 for validation, 2010 for activation, 3010 for key creation, 6010 for deactivation
Maximum number of events to fetch per po: Maximum number of events to fetch per poll (default 100, max 1000)
